summary: This is a O3DE Asset Gem package with a collection of ParticleFX and related assets made with PopcornFX for use in the o3de-multiplayersample (https://www.popcornfx.com/).
requirements: The PopcornFX Gem for o3de can be found here: 'https://www.popcornfx.com/docs/popcornfx-v2-9/plugins/o3de-gem/gem-installation/' The FX distributed in this Gem were made with the PopcornFX editor 'https://www.popcornfx.com/download/' These asset are provided and distributed with restriction under a non-commercial community license 'https://www.popcornfx.com/popcornfx-community-license/' To use them in a commercial product you must obtain a PopcornFX license.
